snippet.title: Mazzle Christmas Trailer
snippet.description:
This game on Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3328870/Mazzle_Christmas/

Mazzle Christmas is a straightforward yet surprisingly challenging celebration of the simple beauty of mazes and jigsaw puzzles in a Christmas style.

In this game, you need to skillfully move the puzzle pieces, find their corresponding places, and seamlessly connect the colorful parts of the maze to complete it. Afterward, guide a small ball through the maze, collecting gifts to unlock the portal to the next level, typically located at the opposite end of the maze.

Use the mouse to move puzzle pieces and the keyboard (WASD or arrow keys) to navigate through the different mazes.

In Mazzle Christmas:

• 50 levels
• 5 kinds of labyrinths
• Colorful Christmas art
• Simple controls
• Christmas music

Subscribe to our social networks:

¤ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blender_games

¤ Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/blendergames
